Body:
testnet = op.network.Cubic(shape=[10, 10, 10])
Nt_old = testnet.Nt
ps1 = [[0, 1], [23, 65]]
ps2 = [[55], [982, 555]]
topotools.connect_pores(testnet, pores1=ps1, pores2=ps2)
am = testnet.create_adjacency_matrix(weights=np.ones(testnet.Nt, dtype=int),
    fmt='csr')
conns = testnet['throat.conns']
assert len(conns) == Nt_old + 6
assert am[0, 55] == 1
assert am[1, 55] == 1
assert am[23, 982] == 1
assert am[23, 555] == 1
assert am[65, 982] == 1
assert am[65, 555] == 1
